bill.title: Student testing; prohibit requirement that teachers readminister test to student on more than one occasion.
bill.description: An Act To Prohibit A Local School Board Of A Public School District Or District Administrator From Requiring Teachers To Readminister Tests To Students On More Than One Occasion After The Original Test Administration; To Provide Discretion To The Teacher Administering A Test To Determine Whether Or Not To Readminister That Test To A Student Who Failed To Make A Satisfactory Passing Score; To Provide That It Shall Be A Felony For Violations Of Such Prohibition; To Bring Forward Sections 37-16-3, 37-16-4, 37-16-5, 37-16-7, 37-16-9 And 37-16-17, Mississippi Code Of 1972, For Purposes Of Possible Amendment; And For Related Purposes.
